summary: Charts Tab Integration Testing Complete. All features working correctly: Charts tab appears in Command Center navigation, TradingView chart renders with candlesticks/volume/MA, symbol search input works, quick symbol buttons (SPY, QQQ, AAPL, NVDA, TSLA, MSFT, AMZN, META) switch charts correctly, clicking chart icons in Scanner/Watchlist widgets navigates to Charts tab with correct symbol, recent charts list tracks viewed symbols, tab state persists when switching tabs.

issues: Minor: Console warning about button nested inside button in WatchlistWidget - validateDOMNesting warning

passed_tests: TEST 1: Charts tab exists in navigation with correct label 'Charts'
TEST 2: Charts tab becomes active on click (cyan-400 styling)
TEST 3: ChartsTab component renders with data-testid='charts-tab'
TEST 4: TradingView widget container present with data-testid='tradingview-widget'
TEST 5: Symbol input found with default value 'SPY' (data-testid='chart-symbol-input')
TEST 7: Typing new symbol (AAPL) and clicking Load updates chart correctly
TEST 8: Quick symbol button NVDA updates chart to NVIDIA Corporation
TEST 9: Quick symbol button QQQ updates chart correctly
TEST 10: Recent charts section displays after symbol changes (ASTS, QQQ, NVDA)
TEST 11: Watchlist widget present in Command tab (data-testid='watchlist-widget')
TEST 13: Chart icons found in widgets (15 chart icons on Command tab)
TEST 14: Clicking chart icon navigates to Charts tab with correct symbol (ASTS)
TEST 15: All 3 tabs present (Command, Charts, Analytics)
TEST 16: TradingView chart renders correctly with candlesticks, volume, and MA line
critical_code_review_comments: ChartsTab.jsx properly integrates with useCommandCenterData hook via viewChart function
TradingViewWidget.jsx uses embedded script approach which works reliably
viewChart function (line 338-344 in useCommandCenterData.js) correctly sets symbol and switches to 'charts' tab
RightSidebar.jsx has onViewChart prop wired to chart icon buttons in Watchlist and Scanner widgets
Recent charts stored in localStorage for persistence across sessions
Quick symbol buttons highlight the active symbol with cyan styling

mocked_apis.note: TradingView widget uses its own data feed (Cboe One)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Charts tab fully integrated into Command Center. TradingView embedded widget (not lightweight-charts) renders candlestick charts with volume and MA. Chart icons in Scanner Alerts and Watchlist widgets use onViewChart prop to navigate to Charts tab. Recent charts tracked in localStorage. Quick symbol buttons: SPY, QQQ, AAPL, NVDA, TSLA, MSFT, AMZN, META.
